short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically saves replays on Pokemon Showdown and sends them to VGCdb.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Analyze your team on VGCdb in real time by fetching directly to its database each game by automatically saving them and sending the replay to the VGCdb server.

https://VGCdb.com
